string.text: Yeah, I know a place where this guy hides his loot. I'll tell you the location ... if you are willing to pay ...
And how much do you want?
30,000 rubles ought to do the trick.
Heh ... No thanks man .. perhaps another time.
Sounds good. I look forward to what I find.
